overview: Rastam hastens the death of his wealthy wife so that he will inherit it. The couple, Magdi and Mona, kidnap a benefactor. Threatening Rustom to kill her if he did not hand them a large sum of money. Rustam refuses and finds an opportunity to get rid of them. The couple admit to a benefactor that they are doing so for the money they need to form a review team, promising them the amount they need. He makes sure to take advantage of the fact that her husband faces him by begging her to save her and he has to accept. Magdi receives money from Rustam and launches it as a benefit, as the infidelity is in her hands. The band reviews are successful.
title: اقتل مراتى و لك تحياتى
